'''Notes'''
Good High End laptop for Linux. Runs over 2.5 hours on battery with normal usage. The only thing that still doesn't work as of 08.08.2011 is suspend (2.6.38-10-generic #46-Ubuntu SMP Tue Jun 28 15:05:41 UTC 2011 i686 i686 i386). It didn't also work with two previous versions of Ubuntu. Hibernate works without problems. The only device that requires proprietary drivers is software modem. WebCam and internal mic are fine out of the box. Also with Skype. Internal SSD card reader only reads standard cards and not HC standard.
